publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2555 Patricia Ferguson: Membership of the Committee of the Regions-That the Parliament endorses the Executive's proposal to nominate Irene Oldfather MSP as a representative of the Parliament to replace Hugh Henry MSP as a full member on the UK delegation to the Committee of the Regions for the forthcoming session from 2002 to 2006. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
